102.text:
JOYCE: So if you were talking to an ordinary audience
member who was hoping to come in and see this

107.text:
production of Hamlet, what would you hope
that they would get from that experience?

111.text:
ROBERTA: I’d like them to feel that Shakespeare can
be an everyday story and nothing to be afraid of.

118.text:
I hope that we’re clear, fascinating,
exciting, so that it’s about theatre as well as

128.text:
storytelling, you know, just the whole
experience of coming to watch and hear a story.

158.text:

164.text:

Coming up here to this building,

173.text:

adventure and I can remember sitting in the

182.text:

what I was seeing happening on the stage.

187.text:

exciting and interesting role of Claudius in Hamlet.

195.text:

not sure that he meant to.

209.text:

of maybe this older brother who rather disregarded him

215.text:

always coveted the crown, he certainly coveted

something about his person with which to do the

235.text:

premeditated it was, it was a dream that maybe
